MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G62 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Milngavie and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to complete a repair on our underground cable network near Boclair View, we need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45AM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11.32AM on 01 November 2020.
